Update trn_costo_marginal_ajuste set trncmausumodificacion = :trncmausumodificacion, trncmafecmodificacion = :trncmafecmodificacion where pericodi = :pericodi and recacodi = :recacodi

select trncmacodi, pericodi, recacodi, trncmafecha, trncmausucreacion, trncmafeccreacion, trncmausumodificacion, trncmafecmodificacion from trn_costo_marginal_ajuste where pericodi = {0} and recacodi = {1} order by trncmafecha asc
select pericodi, perianio, perimes, perinombre from trn_periodo where pericodi = :pericodi

insert into trn_costo_marginal_ajuste (trncmacodi, pericodi,recacodi, trncmafecha, trncmausucreacion, trncmafeccreacion) select (:trncmacodi + rownum) as trncmacodi, :pericodi, :recacodi , trncmafecha, trncmausucreacion, sysdate from trn_costo_marginal_ajuste where pericodi = :pericodi and recacodi = :recacodi order by trncmafecha
delete from trn_costo_marginal_ajuste where pericodi = :pericodi and recacodi = :recacodi
